website_summaries.verdict: Samsung's curved Blu-ray player packs every feature you could ever want into a player that's priced to beat the competition.
cons: The USB port supports the older USB 2.0 standard

customer_reviews.title: I would have given a 5 star rating but it ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given a 5 star rating but it is difficult to know when the disc player is on or off. There is no light on the machine to tell you if it is on. I have to push the power button and then push the open/retract to see if I remembered to turn it off when I used it last. Plays very well and I have no complaints about the quality of the picture. Maybe I'm being petty but I think that Samsung could have put a light in it when the power button is pushed on.
customer_reviews.author: ButchJ

customer_reviews.title: There is no way to look at the player and see if it is on or off, or to even confirm that it has power
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay product, but a couple very simple things make it very frustrating to work with sometimes. For starters there is no light at all on the blu-ray player... it is a black box with two buttons. There is no way to look at the player and see if it is on or off, or to even confirm that it has power! This makes it very hard to troubleshoot when the player doesn't work as expected. My only other complaint is the user interface of the remote... it seemingly has two power buttons? One on the top left and another on the top right. It is not an intuitive experience.
customer_reviews.author: ddav

customer_reviews.title: The player seems to work fine but was obviously pre-used
customer_reviews.text: The player seems to work fine but was obviously pre-used. The box was retaped inexpertly, and the batteries were already loaded in the remote. I also did not receive the HDMI cable that was supposed to be included or the cleaning cloth. Shabby operation. I gave it a 3 because the player does at least work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Pathetic for the price. Kept turning off and on by itself when not in use. No on/off light.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rader

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with purchase of the Samsung BD-J5100 Blu-Ray Disc Player. We have watched several Blu-Ray Discs and enjoyed the video and sound. We have accessed the internet and viewed You-Tube with no difficulty. Our only complaint is that we could not access the internet through our wi-fi modem. We had to contact Samsung to learn this. Once we connected a ethernet cable, all was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Frankrub

customer_reviews.title: Works great was a quick plug and play to my Samsung ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great was a quick plug and play to my Samsung tv and the remotes are all interchangeable. Thus the benefits of having an all Samsung house. I love it would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer ramsey

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Samsung because my previous Blu-Ray/DVD player was a Samsung and I was always happy with that unit until it stopped playing the Blu-Ray discs last year. Having finally gotten myself a big screen tv, a 40", for Christmas, I finally decided it was time to get a new Blu-Ray. And I am so glad I did! So much detail. I'm seeing things that I never saw before even in my often-watched Star Wars and Star Trek movies! So happy I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: William Kounter

customer_reviews.title: Got what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: It did work but read carefully. It's NOT WiFi but hard wired. In watching "Avatar The Movie" (the only Blu Ray watched as of this review) it stuttered a number of time when moving from one chapter to the next. Menu options were limited as were the smart features. By that I assume they mean what streaming apps were available... Not many. I would recommend spending a bit more and getting something a bit more current.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Del Reese

customer_reviews.title: It played 1 disc before it had issues, only played 3 blue rays in its life.
customer_reviews.text: It played 3 blue rays in its life, I don't watch a lot of blue rays or dvd's but this player played 1 disc in the first month, had to play with it to get it to play 1 a month later, then another disc a couple months later then it totally quit and I couldn't make it work it again. The last disc I put in it got ruined when I tried to manually extract it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Arrived when promised and in perfect condition. Easy to hook up and it produces ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived when promised and in perfect condition. Easy to hook up and it produces a great picture. Very happy with everything........
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Not WiFi ready.
customer_reviews.text: This blue ray player is not WiFi ready. It has to be hard-wired to be able to access the features such as Prime or Netflix. Who has a modem in their living room?? This was not mentioned in the description of the player. The owner's manual has very limited information on the use and set up of the player, and non-existent on the remote. No idea on what the different buttons do. Read the description of different players very carefully before you order. Update: Unit did not come with cables, as advertised. NO way to tell if it's on or off. Will definitely read the fine print on item descriptions from now on. Blue ray is being returned today.
customer_reviews.author: Don M

customer_reviews.title: Complete Crap!
customer_reviews.text: Pro: It arrived with remote and cables as advertised. Compact size. Con: Unit turned on, ran set up, then never powered on again. No power lights, anywhere. Is it on or off? Is it even receiving power? Who knows. The basic LED display included on every DVD player since the dawn of time is absent. This is just a black box with a tray and 2 buttons on the front. This would have really helped with the whole, "Is it even on?" issue that we had. Overall: Less functional than my 20-year old VHS player.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Gray

customer_reviews.title: It's good for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy everything about this player. The only downside is that the sound connection is digital connection, you need a special connector to set up regular speakers, prices ranging from $11.00 to $60.00. New optical speakers has a wide range in price, from approx. $24.00 to over $2,000.00. you just have to shop around to find the quality you like and can afford. Like I said the player it's good for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Don Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Small, compact, easy fit and easy install 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: DVD player arrived on day promised, it is small and compact, would fit practically anywhere. Very easy install. It is a “smart” with a lot to offer. Still checking all of its features but I am very happy so far👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Bernadett Pesa

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your HDMI is hooked up correctly
customer_reviews.text: I don't watch much TV, but I have a shelf full of DVD's that were fun to watch the first time around. I wanted a Blu-Ray so I could get some better quality DVD's in the future, but I'm still able to watch a good movie when I find the time. I did hook up the HDMI wrong, and I drove my son crazy with phone calls. Very embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: I. Burcham

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T WORK/NO SELLER RESPONSE
customer_reviews.text: This thing didn't work right since the day we got it. A few months later, it got the point of having to be unplugged and then plugged back in again to get it to (maybe) work. No response from e-mail to seller. Wish I had brought it directly from Amazon or Costco. Stuck with a non-functioning item.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: I now have 2 identical Blue Ray players
customer_reviews.text: I now have one upstairs and 1 downstairs. I bought it because it is exactly the same as the one I bought before. I can play blue-ray, DVD's, CD's, music in it. Loved it so I bought another. Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla B. Klingman

customer_reviews.title: As far as electronics go, this doesn’t hold up.
customer_reviews.text: It’s been less than 1 year & this product no longer works. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: kapaul

customer_reviews.title: Great simple Blu-ray player
customer_reviews.text: A nice simple easy to set up and use Blu-ray player. As other reviewers have said, it would have been nice to have a "power on" indicator on the front of the player, but that is the only minor issue. The on-screen menu is good (only using it to play DVDs) and it is nice that the remote also controls my Samsung TV
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Good Value.
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player works really well. It upverts a standard DVD to make the picture nicer. I wanted to be able to play BluRay DVDs on occasion and this does a great job. I am happy with it and recommend this player and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Olddabbler

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t function after only 4 months:(
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed. It now works only intermittently.. and just purchased 4months ago.. I only used it twice a week for when I watch my grandson. Of course there is no way to contact seller.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: No on indicator light.
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems to work fine at a reasonable price, however, there is no power on light/indicator so unless the TV is on, there is no way to quickly and visually see if the unit is on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to play Blu-Ray disks on my Samsung TV
customer_reviews.text: Ordered via Amazon on 22 November 2018 and received three days later. 2015 model player delivered with a dirty and scratched remote control, thus obviously used by previous owner. While the player is a bit noisy starting up, the image quality is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty

customer_reviews.title: Most disappointing amazon purchase I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Broken right out of the box wouldn’t even turned on.
customer_reviews.author: emapers

customer_reviews.title: Nice player.
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great player. I only use it for watching DVD and Blu-Ray discs while walking on the treadmill, but it has performed flawlessly and works great with the Samsung tv it's connected to.
customer_reviews.author: Susan from Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Love the price. It is definitely very basic and no lighted displays. My only real problem, and this isn't a problem with the unit, is that I have to turn the DVD player on every time I want to use Smarthub on my TV. I suffer from remote confusion, but it's just a matter of figuring out which Samsung remote does what.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice...first blu ray DVD player. Great item with a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Great Blu-Ray player
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this blu-ray player. It loads fast, and the quality is awesome. I would recommend this item to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Gee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Fast ship, well packed, and a nice bundle of everything you need to set up your blu ray player. Works perfectly with my new Samsung tv and we're very pleased! Seller had great communication and, while everything was great, seems very motivated to make sure of 100% customer satisfaction. Hope to do business with them again! :)
customer_reviews.author: L. Folkers

customer_reviews.title: WHERE HOUSE UNIT BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: I liked the unit for picture on Samsung TV. However Unit arrived not loading disk. Small round grey disk in disk tray stopped the loading. Amazon took it back next day and refunded my money. I'm going to try new unit because Sony has gotten weird.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel McMahon

customer_reviews.title: super easy to hook up -everthing included - cable & batteries for remote!
customer_reviews.text: super easy to hook up to a hotel room tv - the box came with everything needed including batteries for the remote! Played dvds well. Easy to carry in & out of hotel. Grandpa was babysitting our 3 year old & you can only have so many tea parties before movie cuddle-time becomes a great diversion.
customer_reviews.author: Erma

customer_reviews.title: Good blue ray DVD player
customer_reviews.text: Used it for two weeks. It is a solid player and does what it suppose to do, nothing fancy. Only reason i am not giving it five stars, is because it has no power LED, and difficult to make out the two buttons power and eject, making you guessing is it ON or OFF.
customer_reviews.author: EliManny

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Spies on you
customer_reviews.text: You have to agree to let Samsung spy on you and share your usage with it's affiliates, or else the player's aps will not work. The remote is cluttered with too many buttons, and it's line of sight to the player is very fussy. The player has no on light. Picture quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: The Virginian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect DVD player
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with this Samsung DVD Player: it was so easy to hook up and shows beautifully sharp DVD's. Sleek appearance is an added bonus. Arrived very quickly as promised. Way to go Amazon :-)
customer_reviews.author: Graymag G.

customer_reviews.title: No signal to TV
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I have one just like it that works great. It said there would be an HDMI cable in the box. It was not there. I used an HDMI cable that I had and knew was good. After much trouble and time, chatting with Amazon tech, then Samsung tech, the machine would not send a signal to the tv. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: GGG

customer_reviews.title: No HDMI cable...... not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I just opened this product and right out of the gate it did not come as advertised! It did not come with the HDMI cable or cloth! Thank goodness it had the remote. This was very disappointing. Luckily I had an extra HDMI cable. I will run it this Tuesday when I rent from the redbox hopefully it will work. I am upset because I love Amazon and this is the first time I ever receive a product and it does not come as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Marc T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: I had my original Samsung DVD player for 11 years and it was slowly getting old . I purchased another Samsung which I like because of it ease of operation. I really like the new machine and it works great. I am very happy with the entire purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Detlev

customer_reviews.title: More than adequate
customer_reviews.text: Have owned several Samsung players. Based on reviews (good) I was expecting something special. Still reliable and easy to use, it doesn't live up to billing re. picture quality in either Blu Ray or DVD formats. Certainly okay, but nothing ground-breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Levalley

customer_reviews.title: and have enjoyed them tremendously
customer_reviews.text: I have had no problem with the DVD player. Everything has worked exactly as it should, and all components were included in the order. I have watched a few movies using the player, and have enjoyed them tremendously. Took me a little bit to familiarize myself with the remote control, but I finally figured things out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little System
customer_reviews.text: This player is very lightweight and small - a definite change from previous dvd players. The picture quality it transmits is very good. I would certainly recommend this player.
customer_reviews.author: itsme

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful deal
customer_reviews.text: We love all samsung products. Our only let down is No display lighting or duh....power light on the device. Makes you feel a little cheated but the price was unbeatable so we went for it. We can make do to balance our budget.
customer_reviews.author: Aminah

customer_reviews.title: Not Wi-Fi enabled
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. plays DVDs well. Only does internet through a wired connection. So, if you want to use wi-fi for the internet apps that this device is capable of, then get something different.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: NOT WIRELESS but a very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice - still wish Samsung would put a light on the front to let you know it is powered ON. I also did NOT notice this was NOT WIRELESS and actually had to trade with my mom, who had one that was. Be sure to check to make sure if you want one that is wireless!!!
customer_reviews.author: JDay

customer_reviews.title: great player
customer_reviews.text: great player sad that VOD is killing dvds & blue rays, easy to use great for in the bed room, has an Ethernet port so you have Netflix& such if needed.
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Blu Ray
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my dad. Works great and delivers the quality for all movies
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent blueray dvd player syncs with my samsung tv perfectly and very user friendly
customer_reviews.author: Rfn

customer_reviews.title: Good Blu-Ray Player for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this unit. It works well and I have already put many hours on it. The only complaints I have is the lack of a glowing power button to let you know the unit is on... and it takes a while for the tray to open up for the placing of the discs. But for the money, the player is a great value! And the seller did an excellent job as well, representing the product accurately.
customer_reviews.author: George Kayaian

customer_reviews.title: No lights on box when on
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work just fine. There aren’t any lights on the box so you don’t know if it’s on until you see the message that the signal is being received on the tv. We thought it was broken at first but it wasn’t.
customer_reviews.author: BrandyMorgan

customer_reviews.title: Hulu is not compatible with it anymore
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT support Hulu any more so it isn’t worth what I paid for it. I got this so I could make my tv a smart tv, being compatible with Netflix, You Tube Amazon And Hulu was why I purchased it. And tech support has no way of fixing it
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it is easy to setup and it is easy to use. It plays DVDs and BlueRays. It came with an HDMI cable, and it worked as well.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my sister in Washington. She is going to have her TV/Audio guys come and install it. Her husband (deceased) bought a large unit and she cannot move it, hence the help. However, the product was to be delivered on Monday and it arrived on Sunday and she was thrilled to get it. I like Samsung product and have a lot of my electronics from them.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie McRoberts

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Description clearly states that it will dvd-r’s
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Description clearly states that it will dvd-r’s. I’ve had the player since February and only played pre recorded discs( which was ok) but now when I go to play dvd-r’s(which play elsewhere btw) it doesn’t work. To late to return it, so I guess I’m stuck. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur D. Margison

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the dvd player, easy to connect, like the fact hdmi cord and the cleaning cloth included, nice touch, didn't have to order cord myself.
customer_reviews.author: W. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality Blu-ray player. It was simple to set up and operate. It provides a high quality picture!
customer_reviews.author: William F. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect BluRay DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: We have a Samsung 65 inch TV and needed a new DVD player. It a wonderful size, easy to install, and the picture quality is great. I highly recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: ZoeyCraig

customer_reviews.title: was easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time, was easy to set up, and works reliably with quality sound and picture quality. I'm very pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B. New

customer_reviews.title: Great unit!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and the remote actually works with my Samsung TV. Now, I don't need to go shopping for a universal remote. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: J Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Worst DVD player we ever owned! No on off indicator light. Not wireless compatible as advertised. No control buttons on unit. Played 25-30 movies, and quit working. Trying to get it to work screws up my tv, and the last movie played is stuck inside the machine. Oddly, some of my movies it would not play, and a message on the screen claimed the movie not available in North America. Really?!?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Wish it had an on/off indicator light. Would be nice if it had WiFi connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Larry SD

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I would give it five stars, great for the money. I bought as a gift for someone who had some older tech they wanted to use with it but couldn't get to work.
customer_reviews.author: Crusty McSwiggins

customer_reviews.title: J5100 Blu-ray player does it all
customer_reviews.text: To tell you the truth, I got mixed up in the ordering process. I thought I was getting something with built-in Wi-Fi. This does not. However, what it does have - the ability to deal with any kind of disc is good, and the operation of the tray is good. I'm not bothered by the lack of an "on" light because the TV automatically finds the HDMI connection to tell me it is on.
customer_reviews.author: Scrugh47

customer_reviews.title: so far so good....love it !
customer_reviews.text: very easy to set up and all good so far...using with my Samsung 46 in tv...just realized they did not include hdmi cable....
customer_reviews.author: Three Victors

customer_reviews.title: good product to own when playing either Blu-ray or DVD's
customer_reviews.text: good product to own when playing either Blu-ray or DVD's, the Blu-ray picture is really clear and good for color I really enjoy using this player
customer_reviews.author: EllaGirl31

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried the blu-ray part, just the DVD, the USB, and the Streaming video. They all work fine. I haven't tried the DLNA part. This seems to be a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Saxton

customer_reviews.title: GIFT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT TAKES AWHILE TO LEARN HOW TO USE. OUR FIRST BLU-RAY PLAYER.
customer_reviews.author: PODEY

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: It's the worst one yet I've had 4 or 5 different blurry players this year and the have all stopped playing bad disc after 1-2.5 months
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Wifi
customer_reviews.text: While the listing mentions on the apps, it should be made clear that it doesn’t connect wirelessly to the internet. It has Ethernet capabilities, but no cord. Huge bust from the Easter bunny this morning!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Manering

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup and one needed function was overlooked.
customer_reviews.text: I only used it for a couple of times, the setup was very easy and for me that's saying a lot. The only negative I have so far is there is no light to indicate on or off, such a simple and needed function was over looked.
customer_reviews.author: Makuli

customer_reviews.title: Good sharp video
customer_reviews.text: Good sharp video. But there is nothing to indicate whether the unit is on or not. Otherwise it's a good unit.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: very nice compact unit
customer_reviews.text: this is a great unit, easy to install and has a super picture. delivery was super quick too. glad I purchased this. the seller was very attentive as well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Walter

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: One of the easiest setups and working well so far. Really like all of the options on the opening screen. Hoping it doesn't encounter some of the issues seen on a few of the reviews but "so far, so good."
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use;great quality
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new DVD player. This one does the trick and it’s so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dee P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Blu-Ray player
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Blu-Ray player. Full featured remote which can control other A/V equipment too.
customer_reviews.author: GNXMan

customer_reviews.title: Nice, small, easy to use Bluray player
customer_reviews.text: Most important feature - good picture quality. Easy to use interface, quick shipping (same day delivery with Prime), all in all a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C. Fesus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product as expected, it has not froze up like another brand I was buying in the store, and the seller got it to me on the day she said it would show. I will definitely order from this seller again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Failed on second use
customer_reviews.text: What more can I say. The machine locked up on its second use and was returned.
customer_reviews.author: N. Dilworth

customer_reviews.title: Still Works after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: The product still working one year after I purchased it. However, it does not play DVD at times. I’ve been able to work around it by first playing blue ray, as a way to resynch.
customer_reviews.author: Paige L. Stafford

customer_reviews.title: I love it; I enjoy being able to watch all ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it; I enjoy being able to watch all of my dvds whether blue ray or otherwise; hope to have it for a long time to come
customer_reviews.author: Brent Pettis

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this device. Spend a few extra dollars and get a better machine. This is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: truman

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked all the time
customer_reviews.text: Works well when its on. Its hard to tell sometimes because there is no light to see if its on or off. Also it sometimes just shuts off.
customer_reviews.author: MillLyn

customer_reviews.title: Samsung BD-J5100
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and install. Essentially plug-and-play. Annoying feature is that, unless the DVD is completely turned off, it will at intervals interrupt when you are using another input, like when watching tv. You will get the DVD input screen and will have to turn it off before you can return to watching tv.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Prost

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and price
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Like the small size. Sometimes the open button is difficult, but I have big fingers
customer_reviews.author: SGBELVERTA

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my parents as there's was getting old. It came to their door on time and they love it. Thanks for a fantastic product at a very responsible price.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: NO WIFI
customer_reviews.text: IT DOES NOT HAVE WIFI. CAN ONLY BE CONNECTED TO INTERNET BY CABLE. BOX SHOULD STATE THIS. CANNOT GET TO 5,ooo AMAZON PTIME SERIES AND MOVIES.
customer_reviews.author: BIG MOE

customer_reviews.title: Great Appliance
customer_reviews.text: Great everything but the remote could have been designed better...
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Ed

customer_reviews.title: The player was easy to order
customer_reviews.text: was just what we needed for upgrading our classrooms. The player was easy to order, we received it in good condition, and it was at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the Blu-ray player we needed
customer_reviews.text: This player was easy to set up, is easy to use, and works great. Just attached the HDMI cable from the player to the TV and plugged it in. I pressed the player's ON button and it turned the TV on. After a couple of SETUP questions, it was ready to play a DVD. I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Mathprof

customer_reviews.title: Must buy a HMDI cable
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my truck . As a truck driver all new trucks are equipped with flat screen TV .
customer_reviews.author: JOHN MC DONALD

customer_reviews.title: Good item. Bad remote control design (Button size & ...
customer_reviews.text: Good item. Bad remote control design (Button size & placement). An addition of a "zoom" feature would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good with one super annoying flaw
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good with the exception of the fact that it randomly turns itself on, which annoys me greatly, when I'm watching something else and my tv switches to that input. I now keep the hdmi cable disconnected when not in use, which is a pain in and of itself.
customer_reviews.author: ADZ

customer_reviews.title: No power light
customer_reviews.text: I just wish it had a power indicator light to tell it is on or off.
customer_reviews.author: B.J. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: works well but doesn't have a light on it to let you know it is on
customer_reviews.text: i can not find out how to interrupt a movie and start over. If I don't let the dvd play to the end of the credits it will resume right there the next time i insert it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to set up. Works perfectly and arrived as promised. What more could you ask?
customer_reviews.author: Diane G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Netflix, Youtube and Amazon
customer_reviews.text: We've had this player for a year so far and it continues to work great. We replaced our Sony player with this one because the Sony kept hanging up when using Netflix and other aps on the player. This one works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Not available" black bars top & bottom are annoying. I own a Samsung Smart TV that's only ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't give me a full picture, message that keeps popping up says, "Not available" black bars top & bottom are annoying. I own a Samsung Smart TV that's only five months old. This Blu-Ray Disc Player is not compatible with the TV and not a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery, great prices, works as described.
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, great price, works as described. I was thinking it had WiFi but the Q&A section clearly indicates that it doesn't. Oh well. I can run a cable if I really need Internet access.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Keep it Simple.
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable cost. Easy hook up. Easy to operate. Picture and sound good
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: First blu-ray player
customer_reviews.text: Product came as expected! New and it works great. Would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: nathan moffitt

customer_reviews.title: No wireless capability
customer_reviews.text: The BD-J5100 functions. It is advertised as a smart blue ray player. It is assumed that this means wireless router capable. Not the case. It requires a hard line connection, not included. How many people watch TV where there computer is ? Also, there are no manual play buttons on the unit, so if you misplace your remote you're out of luck until you find it, or get another.
customer_reviews.author: Claudegeorge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Kind of a confusing menu but I will get used to it!
customer_reviews.author: monster2795

product_meta.title: Samsung BD-J5100 Curved Blu-Ray Disc Player with Remote control
product_meta.description: Experience the best picture and sound quality available combined with advanced special features on the Samsung BD-J5100 Blu-ray Disc player. Featuring full HD 1080P playback via HDMI, 1080P resolution upscaling, Dolby Trued, and DTS- HD Master Audio; the BD-J5100, brings your home theatre system to a whole new level providing higher quality video and audio for your entertainment. The BD-J5100 plays back BD, BD, DVD, DVD-/+R/RW, Plus with a USB 2.0 port allows to connect and share content via USB. An HDMI port allows for outputting Full HD video to your external display and with built-in LAN and apps for Netflix, Hulu, YouTube etc. Your fully set up for streaming. The Blu-ray player is easy to set up and has a start mode as quick as 0.5 seconds, so don't wait and start enjoying your favorite entertainment in a new way now. Hemi cable with an HDMI cable you can connect to the players HDMI port for outputting to an external display and enjoy the highest quality audio and video entertainment. Cleaning cloth with technology This 100% cotton cloth is designed to clean all electronic devices Keeping them in good shape. Remote control.
feature_bullets: High Resolution Video: Enjoy your favorite entertainment in greater quality with full HD 1080p Playback via HDMI. Even lower-resolution content can conform to 1080p display with the blu-ray player’s 1080p Resolution Upscaling feature.

Stunning Audio Quality: Featuring Dolby TrueHD and DTS-HD Master Audio, the blu-ray player provides an advanced sound experience with enhanced bass response, clear dialog, and consistent volume levels.
Built-in Apps: The smart blu-ray player has built-in LAN and built-in apps for Netflix, Hulu, YouTube etc. so you’re fully set up for streaming movies, TV, music and more.
Easy Access and Sharing: With a USB 2.0 port you can connect and share your stored files via USB or external hard drive directly to the blu-ray player.

Superior Entertainment Experience: With an HDMI cable which is included in the bundle you can connect to the player’s HDMI port for outputting to an external display and enjoy the highest quality audio and video entertainment.
Product Dimensions (W x H x D): 11.46" x 1.57" x 8.7"
